title: 16. Mitsuye Endo: Quietly Courageous Plaintiff
itunes:title: 16. Mitsuye Endo: Quietly Courageous Plaintiff
description: Season 2, Episode 5: Jay tells Alex about Mitsuye Endo, the only person to successfully sue for Habeus Corpus during the forced internment of Japanese American citizens during WWII.
